outputs.output_descr: The project is an integral component of UNDP's new support startegy for Africa, which aims to develop domestic and regional capacity for pro-poor growth and economic and political accountability as a means of accelerating the region's progress towards achievement of the MDGs. It is part of UNDP's global effort to scale up capacity development efforts and related support services through, among other things, appropriate frameworks, methods and tools to help countries achieve their national development goals and accelerate progress towards the attainment of MDGs.

project_descr: Scaling up Capacity Development Frameworks and Refocusing UNDP Resources for Pro-Poor Growth and Accountability
